metadata.title: CVE-2024-36955 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: hda: intel-sdw-acpi: fix usage of device_get_named_child_node()The documentation for device_get_named_child_node() mentions thisimportant point:"The caller is responsible for calling fwnode_handle_put() on thereturned fwnode pointer."Add fwnode_handle_put() to avoid a leaked reference.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
